overview: What is the inner shame that drove the director to Berlin? Slipping away from Sarajevo, a land foreign to him, he visits a gay couple who have recently started living together in Germany, as he ruminates on his mother’s warning not to break faith with his religion. Recalling what took place at a gay club in Berlin four years earlier, he returns there. Troubled by his past, he is forced to look deep inside himself. This is a road movie about one man’s heart.
title: Foolish Steps of a Fat Cow
